MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY14 postcode area of Malpas, affecting properties in Oldcastle Lane, Wrexham Road and surrounding area. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a broken overhead line pole. Our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:00PM on 19th February 2021.?
